title: The Bogus ‘Joint Statement’ between President of Sri Lanka and Ban-Ki Moon
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – There is an underpinning effort made surreptitiously across the Panel of Expert report to give the impression that the 3 member team was appointed to ‘give effect to’ the joint statement made in 2009 between the Sri Lankan President and the UN Secretary General. Firstly, the Panel’s report makes…
